other_tests.findings: Moderate villous blunting with mildly increased inflammatory cells in the lamina propria and intraepithelial lymphocytosis. Enterocytes at the villous tips showed an irregular vacuolated appearance in the apical cytoplasm with patchy absence of the brush border. Surface epithelial brush border exhibited an abnormal pattern of PAS and CD10 staining instead of the normal linear pattern.

other_tests.procedure_name: Surgical full thickness ileal and colonic biopsies
other_tests.findings: Microvillus inclusions were detected by electron microscopy in the ileal biopsy. Colonic biopsies were normal with no epithelial abnormality.
Detected Homozygous c.1323-2A>G mutation of the MYO5B gene.
